sentence: Ever dreamt of making money while you sleep? AI chatbots are your ticket to passive income. Here’s the scoop: businesses are on the hunt for 24/7 customer service solutions without breaking the bank. Enter AI chatbots. You can create and sell custom chatbot services to businesses, from local shops to online startups. All you need is a basic understanding of AI platforms like ChatGPT. Customize bots to handle bookings, answer FAQs, and even sell products. The best part? Once set up, these bots work round-the-clock, generating income with minimal upkeep. Dive into chatbot creation today, and start your journey towards earning while you snooze. Ready to become a chatbot champ? Let's get coding!
